TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HostFileChangeMonitor extends System.Runtime.Caching.FileChangeMonitor
Public NotInheritable Class HostFileChangeMonitor Inherits FileChangeMonitor

summary.span: 监视目录和文件路径，并向缓存通知被监视项的更改情况。

span.span: Monitors directories and file paths and notifies the cache of changes to the monitored items.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是类型的具体实现。 The class is a concrete implementation of the type. 此类是密封的, 因此不能对其进行扩展。This class is sealed, therefore it cannot be extended. 如果要使用现有缓存实现并监视文件和目录的更改, 则此类非常有用。This class is useful if you want to use an existing cache implementation and to monitor files and directories for changes. 对于每个指定的文件或目录路径 , 如果发生以下任何更改, 则类会触发更改通知:For each specified file or directory path, the class triggers a change notification if any of the following changes occur: - 监视的文件或目录的名称更改。The name of the monitored file or directory changes. - 创建监视器时, 指定的文件或目录不存在, 但以后创建。The specified file or directory did not exist at the time the monitor was created, but was created later. 换句话说, 文件或目录是在监视项的作用域中创建的。In other words, a file or directory was created in the scope of the monitored items. - 已更改的监视文件的大小。The size of a monitored file changed. - 已更改监视文件的内容, 或已更改监视目录的内容。The contents of a monitored file changed, or the contents of a monitored directory changed. - 已更改文件或目录的访问控制列表 (ACL)。The access control list (ACL) of the file or directory was changed. - 所监视的文件或目录已被删除。The monitored file or directory was deleted. 如果同时对被监视的文件或目录发生了太多的更改, 则实例可能会无法跟踪特定更改。If too many changes occur for the monitored file or directory at the same time, the instance can lose track of specific changes. 在此方案中, 类会触发更改通知。In this scenario, the class triggers a change notification. 当实例监视某个目录时, 更有可能出现这种情况, 而在较短的时间内在目录结构的作用域中发生了许多更改。This scenario is more likely to occur when the instance monitors a directory, and many changes occur in the scope of the directory structure in a short period of time. 由于类的用途只是为了表明已在一组受监视的文件和目录之间更改了某些内容, 因此不会将有关特定更改的详细信息视为不会被视为重要。Because the purpose of the class is only to signal that something has changed among the set of monitored files and directories, it is not considered important that details about a specific change are not captured. 类的用途是提供状态已更改的通知, 以便可以逐出缓存项 (或项)。The purpose of the class is to provide notification that state changed so that a cache entry (or entries) can be evicted. 因为类不会确切地指示所更改的内容, 所以内部更改跟踪溢出无关。Because the class does not indicate exactly what changed, internal-change tracking overflow is irrelevant. 为实例提供路径时, 目录和文件路径必须是目录或文件的完整路径。When you supply paths to a instance, the directory and file paths must be full paths to the directory or file. 不允许在路径中使用相对路径和通配符。Relative paths and wildcard characters in paths are not allowed. 当类在 ASP.NET 应用程序中使用时, 用于访问被监视项的 Windows 标识是 ASP.NET 应用程序的应用程序标识。When the class is used in an ASP.NET application, the Windows identity that is used for access to monitored items is the application identity for the ASP.NET application. 换句话说, 应用程序标识将是以下各项之一:In other words, the application identity will be one of the following: - 进程标识。The process identity. - 配置的应用程序标识。The configured application identity. - UNC 凭据 (如果应用程序从 UNC 共享运行)。The UNC credential if the application is running from a UNC share. 在 non-ASP.NET 应用程序中使用 类时,类在内部使用,以监视文件。When the class is used in a non-ASP.NET application, the class is used internally to monitor files. 因此, 适用于受监视的文件或目录的任何访问控制列表 (ACL) 将应用于当前线程的 Windows 标识。As a result, whatever access control list (ACL) applies to a monitored file or directory is applied to the Windows identity of the current thread. > [!NOTE] > 调用方必须具有适当级别的代码访问安全性 (CAS) 权限, 并且必须对所有监视的目录和路径具有 NTFS 权限。Callers must have the appropriate level of code access security (CAS) permissions and must have NTFS permissions to all monitored directories and paths. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个缓存项, 该缓存项使用对象来监视文件系统上的源数据 (即文件) 的状态。The following example creates a cache item that uses a object to monitor the state of the source data (which is a file) on the file system. 缓存项是使用对象定义的, 用于提供缓存项的逐出和过期详细信息。The cache entry is defined using a object to provide eviction and expiration details for the cache entry. [!code-csharp[CachingASPNetApplications#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/cachingaspnetapplications/cs/default.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CachingASPNetApplications#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/cachingaspnetapplications/vb/default.aspx.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<string> filePaths) cil managed
Public Sub New (filePaths As IList(Of String))

param.name: filePaths
param.span: 包含要监视的一个或多个目录路径或文件路径的列表。

span.span: A list that contains one or more directory paths or file paths to monitor.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对构造函数的调用必须为该`filePaths`参数提供一个非 null 值。Calls to the constructor must provide a non-null value for the `filePaths` parameter. 构造函数至少会验证传递给它的路径集合, 然后对这些路径进行监视。At a minimum, the constructor validates the collection of paths that is passed into it and then initializes monitoring for those paths. > [!NOTE] > 构造函数仅对路径名称执行字符串验证。The constructor performs only string validation of the path name. 它不会规范化路径或验证路径是否存在。It does not canonicalize paths or validate that the paths exist.

exception.span: 列表中的路径为 或空字符串。

span.span: A path in the list is or an empty string.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property FilePaths As ReadOnlyCollection(Of String)

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取已传递给 构造函数的目录和文件路径的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of directories and file paths that was passed to the constructor.

value.span: 目录和文件路径的集合。

span.span: A collection of directories and file paths.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property LastModified As DateTimeOffset
public: virtual property DateTimeOffset LastModified { DateTimeOffset get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取一个只读值，该值指示所监视文件或路径的上次写入时间。

span.span: Gets a read-only value that indicates the last write time of a monitored file or path.

value.span: 所监视文件或路径的上次写入时间。

span.span: The last write time of a monitored file or path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果文件更改监视器监视多个文件或路径, 则此属性将返回所有文件和路径集中的最近写入时间。If a file-change monitor is monitoring multiple files or paths, this property returns the most recent write time in the set of all files and paths.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property UniqueId As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ UniqueId { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取基于被监视的目录和文件路径集的 实例的标识符。

span.span: Gets an identifier for the instance that is based on the set of monitored directories and file paths.
An identifier for the change monitor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构成属性值的字符串从以下部分构造:The string that makes up the property value is constructed from the following parts: - 文件或目录路径。A file or directory path. - UTC 时间的最近写入时间, 以计时周期度量, 但表示为十六进制字符串。The most recent write time in UTC time, measured as ticks but represented as a hexadecimal string. - 文件大小, 以十六进制字符串表示。The file size, represented as a hexadecimal string. 如果文件更改监视器监视多个路径, 则此属性返回的信息将连接到所有监视的目录和文件路径的单个字符串。If a file change monitor is monitoring multiple paths, the information returned by this property is concatenated into a single string for all the monitored directories and file paths.
